arts.ttl: Thiago double helps Brentford beat 10-man Newcastle
arts.sum: Two goals from Igor Thiago helps Brentford come from behind to earn a 3-1 win over Newcastle United at the GTech Community Stadium in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: BBC Sport comments from ‘neutrals’ on Newcastle United after 3-1 Brentford defeat
arts.sum: Interesting to read through these BBC Sport comments, following on from Newcastle United losing 3-1 to Brentford. The comments from neutrals especially telling… A lot of it different to what... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe reacts to Brentford 3 Newcastle 1 ‘At the moment we are suffering…’
arts.sum: Eddie Howe watched on as the game ended Brentford 3 Newcastle 1. Harvey Barnes having given United a half-time lead with a classy piece of play and finish. Only for... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Igor Thiago brace burns 10-man Newcastle as Brentford secure impressive comeback
arts.sum: Keith Andrews's inspired Brentford completed an impressive 3-1 comeback win over Newcastle United at the Gtech Community Stadium in the Premier League on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Brentford were relentless - Andrews on win over Newcastle
arts.sum: Keith Andrews believes his side got the result they "deserved" as Brentford come from a goal down to beat Newcastle 3-1 at the Gtech Community Stadium in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Late Thiago double earns comeback win for Brentford against 10-man Newcastle
arts.athr: Ben Bloom at the Gtech Community Stadium
arts.sum: Something is seriously wrong with Newcastle on the road. It is all well and good raising their game for the biggest Champions League occasions at St James’ Park, but if they continue to play like they did against Brentford – just as they did in defeat at West Ham a week earlier, and countless times over a concerning number of months – those European nights may well become a distant memory. That they ended this game with a numerical disadvantage after Dan Burn’s sending off was of little relevance to a defeat that they fully deserved. Harvey Barnes’s goal aside they were utterly impotent, offering only that solitary shot on target all match. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Newcastle’s wait for Premier League away win continues after defeat at Brentford
arts.sum: Igor Thiago’s double and Kevin Schade ensured another miserable away day for the Magpies, despite taking the lead.

arts.ttl: Thiago inspires Brentford as Newcastle's winless away run continues
arts.sum: Newcastle's winless run away from home in the Premier League extended to 10 games as Brentford came from behind to secure a 3-1 victory at the Gtech.

arts.ttl: Premier League Explanation on 'Shocking' VAR Decision During Brentford vs Newcastle
arts.sum: Brentford's tweet on the incident said it all.
